info.name: MWork + PhotoStudio API (Full)
info.description: Full Postman collection for MWork Backend and PhotoStudio integration endpoints.

request.description: Health check endpoint for MWork API.

exec: pm.test('Response has status ok', function () { const json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json.status).to.eql('ok'); });
pm.test('Response has pong message', function () { const json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json.message).to.eql('pong'); });
pm.test('Status code is 201 or 409', function () { pm.expect([201, 409]).to.include(pm.response.code); });

request.description: Authenticate against MWork API and store access token.

exec: const token = (json && json.tokens && json.tokens.access_token) || json.access_token || json.token || (json.data && json.data.token) || json.jwt;
pm.test('Access token is present', function () { pm.expect(token, 'access token').to.be.ok; });

pm.test('User id and email exist', function () { const json = pm.response.json(); pm.expect(json.id).to.be.ok; pm.expect(json.email).to.be.ok; if (!pm.environment.get('mwork_user_id')) { pm.environment.set('mwork_user_id', json.id); } });
pm.test('Status code is 201 or 409', function () { pm.expect([201, 409]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
pm.test('Status code is 201 or 409', function () { pm.expect([201, 409]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
pm.test('Status code is 201 or 409', function () { pm.expect([201, 409]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
pm.test('Status code is 200 or 204', function () { pm.expect([200, 204]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
pm.test('Status code is 201 or 409', function () { pm.expect([201, 409]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
pm.test('Status code is 200 or 201', function () { pm.expect([200, 201]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
pm.test('Status code is 200 or 204', function () { pm.expect([200, 204]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
pm.test('Status code is 201 or 409', function () { pm.expect([201, 409]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
pm.test('Status code is 201 or 200', function () { pm.expect([200, 201]).to.include(pm.response.code); });

pm.test('Studios array is present', function () { pm.expect(json.data && json.data.studios).to.be.an('array'); });
if (!pm.environment.get('studio_id') && json.data && json.data.studios && json.data.studios.length > 0) { pm.environment.set('studio_id', json.data.studios[0].id); }
pm.test('Status code is 200 or 201', function () { pm.expect([200, 201]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
const bookingId = json && json.data && json.data.booking && json.data.booking.id;
pm.test('Status code is 201 or 200', function () { pm.expect([200, 201]).to.include(pm.response.code); });

pm.test('Status code is 200 or 400', function () { pm.expect([200, 400]).to.include(pm.response.code); });
